COVID-19 update

Read the latest COVID-19 updates from the University and find out how we are supporting our community.

Challenge your ideas and become a creative and critical thinker at the Wellington Faculty of Humanities and Social Sciences.

Our diverse range of courses and location in the nation’s capital and cultural heart will provide you with unrivalled opportunities to build your future.

Explore our schools Contact an adviser

Find us on

Find an expert

Enrol for Trimester 3 2022 or 2023

If you are continuing your existing programme, you only need to complete course enrolment. Current students only need to apply for admission if you are starting a new programme.

Important information for 2023 applicants

We’ve made some changes to our system—if you applied for accommodation before 10 September, please check your email and use the link to update your logins to use our new system. Find out more.

At a glance

Victoria’s research output is used at community, national and international levels. Our academic and business partnerships have global impacts in many fields.
